summary.span: 命名空間包含介面，元件可使用此介面來存取型別資訊及叫用型別成員。

span.span: The namespace contains interfaces that components use to access type information and invoke type members.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用中的介面命名空間，以啟用遠端物件的存取類型資訊的元件，而不需要直接存取之遠端物件。Use the interfaces in the namespace to enable components to access type information for a remote object without having direct access to the of the remote object. 命名空間會定義元件所使用的介面和結構中的反映功能， ，和通訊的命名空間。The namespace defines reflection functionality for components that use the interfaces and structures in the , , and namespaces to communicate. 這些命名空間中的介面也稱為合約。The interfaces in these namespaces are also called contracts. 所有合約都衍生自介面。All contracts derive from the interface. 當使用合約來管理元件之間的通訊，您必須實作公開給其他元件的型別資訊的型別中的介面。When using contracts to manage the communication between components, you must implement the interface in a type to expose the type information to other components. 元件可再存取該型別的成員，藉由呼叫方法的介面，以取得。Components can then access the members of the type by calling the method of the interface to get an . 另一個介面和結構中命名空間提供的存取權委派、 屬性、 方法、 事件和欄位的型別資訊。The other interfaces and structures in the namespace provide access to type information for delegates, properties, methods, events, and fields. 元件可以使用中的合約是在不同的處理序或應用程式定義域中，或在相同的程序或應用程式定義域中物件的存取類型資訊的命名空間。Components can use the contracts in the namespace to access type information for an object that is in a different process or application domain, or in the same process or application domain.
